testsuite.name: testCase.TC008_VerifyAllProductsAndProductDetailPage
testsuite.system-out: Navigating to baseURL: http://automationexercise.com Home Page is displayed successfully Click on 'Products' button,Verify user is navigated to ALL PRODUCTS page successfully The products list is visible Click on 'View Product' of first product, User is landed to product detail page Verified that detail is visible: product name, category, price, availability, condition, brand
